titles: An act appointing Thursday the thirteenth of June, 1650. to be kept as a day of solemn fasting and humiliation and declaring the reasons and grounds thereof.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and Iohn Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,
notes: Order to print dated: Die Martis, 21 Maii, 1650. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
